text: Enzo Sergio Escobar Olivares (born November 10, 1951 in Limache) is a retired football defender from Chile, who played for Club de Deportes Cobreloa. He represented Chile at the 1982 FIFA World Cup, wearing the number 20 jersey. ==External links== * Category:1951 births Category:Chilean footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Cobreloa footballers Category:Chile international footballers Category:1982 FIFA World Cup players Category:1979 Copa América players Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Enzo Escobar
